title: The Shawshank Redemption
plot: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

title: The Godfather Part II
plot: The continuation of the Corleone saga as Michael Corleone becomes the patriarch of the organized crime dynasty.

title: The Dark Knight
plot: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc on Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest tests to fight injustice.

title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
plot: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

title: Inception
plot: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.

title: Fight Club
plot: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

title: The Matrix
plot: A computer programmer discovers that reality as he knows it is a simulation created by machines.

title: Goodfellas
plot: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife and his partners in the criminal enterprise.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
plot: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.

title: Se7en
plot: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives for his killings.

title: Saving Private Ryan
plot: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper.

title: Interstellar
plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Green Mile
plot: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape.

title: Parasite
plot: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

title: The Usual Suspects
plot: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat.

title: The Lion King
plot: Lion prince Simba flees his kingdom after the death of his father, only to discover the truth about his past.

title: Back to the Future
plot: A teenager is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his friend.

title: Whiplash
plot: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor.

title: Gladiator
plot: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: The Prestige
plot: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion.

title: The Sixth Sense
plot: A frightened, withdrawn Philadelphia boy who communicates with ghosts seeks the help of an intervention specialist.

title: American Beauty
plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis when he becomes infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

title: The Departed
plot: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang.

title: 12 Angry Men
plot: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

title: Schindler's List
plot: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.

title: The Dark Knight Rises
plot: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman is forced out of exile with the emergence of a new terrorist leader.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
plot: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
plot: A meek Hobbit inherits a mysterious ring and must travel across Middle-earth to destroy it.

title: Star Wars: Episode V
plot: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training.

title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
plot: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse.

title: Memento
plot: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer using notes and tattoos.

title: Seven Samurai
plot: Seven samurai are hired by villagers to protect their village from bandits.

title: Singin' in the Rain
plot: A silent film star must convince his estranged partner to help him rework an upcoming musical.

title: It's a Wonderful Life
plot: An angel shows a financially troubled businessman what his town would have been like if he had never been born.

title: Sunset Boulevard
plot: A desperate screenwriter and a faded film star engage in a dark obsession.

title: Psycho
plot: A woman is murdered in a motel bathroom, and a private detective is hired to solve the case.

title: Casablanca
plot: A cynical American cafe owner in Casablanca reluctantly helps his old flame and her husband escape the Nazis.

title: Vertigo
plot: A retired San Francisco detective obsesses over the disappearance of a woman who resembles his client's wife.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
plot: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired to retrieve the lost Ark of the Covenant.

title: Jaws
plot: When a giant great white shark begins hunting swimmers on the New England coast, the police chief takes action.

title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
plot: A phone home is the only hope for an alien stranded on Earth to return to his mother ship.

title: The Shining
plot: A family isolated in an island hotel during the winter is influenced by an evil presence to commit violent acts.

title: Alien
plot: The crew of a commercial spacecraft is awakened to engage with an extraterrestrial creature.

title: Blade Runner
plot: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in an attempt to escape.

title: Double Indemnity
plot: An insurance salesman and a femme fatale plot the murder of her husband.

title: The Big Sleep
plot: Private detective Philip Marlowe is hired to solve a blackmail case in 1940s Los Angeles.

title: Breakfast at Tiffany's
plot: A romantic comedy about a young woman of mysterious background who tries to marry a rich man.

title: Rear Window
plot: A photographer with a broken leg witnesses a potential murder in a neighboring apartment.
